       7             : #ifndef mozilla_dom_FileSystemTaskBase_h
       8             : #define mozilla_dom_FileSystemTaskBase_h
       9             : 
      10             : #include "mozilla/ErrorResult.h"
      11             : #include "mozilla/dom/FileSystemRequestParent.h"
      12             : #include "mozilla/dom/PFileSystemRequestChild.h"
      13             : #include "nsIIPCBackgroundChildCreateCallback.h"
      14             : #include "nsThreadUtils.h"
      15             : 
      16             : namespace mozilla {
      17             : namespace dom {
      18             : 
      19             : class BlobImpl;
      20             : class FileSystemBase;
      21             : class FileSystemParams;
      22             : class PBlobParent;
      23             : 
      24             : /*
      25             :  * The base class to implement a Task class.
      26             :  * The file system operations can only be performed in the parent process. In
      27             :  * order to avoid duplicated code, we used PBackground for child-parent and
      28             :  * parent-parent communications.
      29             :  *
      30             :  * The following diagram illustrates the how a API call from the content page
      31             :  * starts a task and gets call back results.
      32             :  *
      33             :  * The left block is the call sequence inside any process loading content, while
      34             :  * the right block is the call sequence only inside the parent process.
      35             :  *
      36             :  *       Page
      37             :  *        |
      38             :  *        | (1)
      39             :  *  ______|_________________________     |    _________________________________
      40             :  * |      |                          |   |   |                                 |
      41             :  * |      |                          |   |   |                                 |
      42             :  * |      V                          |  IPC  | PBackground thread on           |
      43             :  * | [new FileSystemTaskChildBase()] |   |   | the parent process              |
      44             :  * |         |                       |   |   |                                 |
      45             :  * |         | (2)                   |       |                                 |
      46             :  * |         V                       |  (3)  |                                 |
      47             :  * |    [GetRequestParams]------------------->[new FileSystemTaskParentBase()] |
      48             :  * |                                 |       |          |                      |
      49             :  * |                                 |   |   |          | (4)   _____________  |
      50             :  * |                                 |   |   |          |      |             | |
      51             :  * |                                 |   |   |          |      | I/O Thread  | |
      52             :  * |                                 |   |   |          |      |             | |
      53             :  * |                                 |   |   |          ---------> [IOWork]  | |
      54             :  * |                                 |  IPC  |                 |     |       | |
      55             :  * |                                 |   |   |                 |     | (5)   | |
      56             :  * |                                 |   |   |          --------------       | |
      57             :  * |                                 |   |   |          |      |_____________| |
      58             :  * |                                 |   |   |          |                      |
      59             :  * |                                 |   |   |          V                      |
      60             :  * |                                 |   |   |     [HandleResult]              |
      61             :  * |                                 |   |   |          |                      |
      62             :  * |                                 |       |          | (6)                  |
      63             :  * |                                 |  (7)  |          V                      |
      64             :  * |   [SetRequestResult]<---------------------[GetRequestResult]              |
      65             :  * |       |                         |       |                                 |
      66             :  * |       | (8)                     |   |   |                                 |
      67             :  * |       V                         |   |   |                                 |
      68             :  * |[HandlerCallback]                |  IPC  |                                 |
      69             :  * |_______|_________________________|   |   |_________________________________|
      70             :  *         |                             |
      71             :  *         V
      72             :  *        Page
      73             :  *
      74             :  * 1. From the process that is handling the request
      75             :  * Child/Parent (it can be in any process):
      76             :  *   (1) Call FileSystem API from content page with JS. Create a task and run.
      77             :  *   The base constructor [FileSystemTaskChildBase()] of the task should be
      78             :  *   called.
      79             :  *   (2) Forward the task to the parent process through the IPC and call
      80             :  *   [GetRequestParams] to prepare the parameters of the IPC.
      81             :  * Parent:
      82             :  *   (3) The parent process receives IPC and handle it in
      83             :  *   FileystemRequestParent. Get the IPC parameters and create a task to run the
      84             :  *   IPC task.
      85             :  *   (4) The task operation will be performed in the member function of [IOWork].
      86             :  *   A I/O  thread will be created to run that function. If error occurs
      87             :  *   during the operation, call [SetError] to record the error and then abort.
      88             :  *   (5) After finishing the task operation, call [HandleResult] to send the
      89             :  *   result back to the child process though the IPC.
      90             :  *   (6) Call [GetRequestResult] request result to prepare the parameters of the
      91             :  *   IPC. Because the formats of the error result for different task are the
      92             :  *   same, FileSystemTaskChildBase can handle the error message without
      93             :  *   interfering.
      94             :  *   Each task only needs to implement its specific success result preparation
      95             :  *   function -[GetSuccessRequestResult].
      96             :  * Child/Parent:
      97             :  *   (7) The process receives IPC and calls [SetRequestResult] to get the
      98             :  *   task result. Each task needs to implement its specific success result
      99             :  *   parsing function [SetSuccessRequestResult] to get the success result.
     100             :  *   (8) Call [HandlerCallback] to send the task result to the content page.
     101             :  */
     102             : class FileSystemTaskChildBase : public PFileSystemRequestChild
     103             :                               , public nsIIPCBackgroundChildCreateCallback
     104             : {
     105             : public:
     106             :   NS_DECL_ISUPPORTS
     107             :   NS_DECL_NSIIPCBACKGROUNDCHILDCREATECALLBACK
     108             : 
     109             :   /*
     110             :    * Start the task. It will dispatch all the information to the parent process,
     111             :    * PBackground thread. This method must be called from the owning thread.
     112             :    */
     113             :   void
     114             :   Start();
     115             : 
     116             :   /*
     117             :    * The error codes are defined in xpcom/base/ErrorList.h and their
     118             :    * corresponding error name and message are defined in dom/base/domerr.msg.
     119             :    */
     120             :   void
     121             :   SetError(const nsresult& aErrorCode);
     122             : 
     123             :   FileSystemBase*
     124             :   GetFileSystem() const;
     125             : 
     126             :   /*
     127             :    * After the task is completed, this function will be called to pass the task
     128             :    * result to the content page. This method is called in the owning thread.
     129             :    * Override this function to handle the call back to the content page.
     130             :    */
     131             :   virtual void
     132             :   HandlerCallback() = 0;
     133             : 
     134             :   bool
     135           0 :   HasError() const { return NS_FAILED(mErrorValue); }
     136             : 
     137             : protected:
     138             :   /*
     139             :    * To create a task to handle the page content request.
     140             :    */
     141             :   FileSystemTaskChildBase(nsIGlobalObject* aGlobalObject,
     142             :                           FileSystemBase* aFileSystem);
     143             : 
     144             :   virtual
     145             :   ~FileSystemTaskChildBase();
     146             : 
     147             :   /*
     148             :    * Wrap the task parameter to FileSystemParams for sending it through IPC.
     149             :    * It will be called when we need to forward a task from the child process to
     150             :    * the parent process. This method runs in the owning thread.
     151             :    * @param filesystem The string representation of the file system.
     152             :    */
     153             :   virtual FileSystemParams
     154             :   GetRequestParams(const nsString& aSerializedDOMPath,
     155             :                    ErrorResult& aRv) const = 0;
     156             : 
     157             :   /*
     158             :    * Unwrap the IPC message to get the task success result.
     159             :    * It will be called when the task is completed successfully and an IPC
     160             :    * message is received in the child process and we want to get the task
     161             :    * success result. This method runs in the owning thread.
     162             :    */
     163             :   virtual void
     164             :   SetSuccessRequestResult(const FileSystemResponseValue& aValue,
     165             :                           ErrorResult& aRv) = 0;
     166             : 
     167             :   // Overrides PFileSystemRequestChild
     168             :   virtual mozilla::ipc::IPCResult
     169             :   Recv__delete__(const FileSystemResponseValue& value) override;
     170             : 
     171             :   nsresult mErrorValue;
     172             :   RefPtr<FileSystemBase> mFileSystem;
     173             :   nsCOMPtr<nsIGlobalObject> mGlobalObject;
     174             : 
     175             : private:
     176             : 
     177             :   /*
     178             :    * Unwrap the IPC message to get the task result.
     179             :    * It will be called when the task is completed and an IPC message is received
     180             :    * in the content process and we want to get the task result. This runs on the
     181             :    * owning thread.
     182             :    */
     183             :   void
     184             :   SetRequestResult(const FileSystemResponseValue& aValue);
     185             : };
     186             : 
     187             : // This class is the 'alter ego' of FileSystemTaskChildBase in the PBackground
     188             : // world.
     189             : class FileSystemTaskParentBase : public Runnable
     190             : {
     191             : public:
     192             :   FileSystemTaskParentBase()
     193             :     : Runnable("FileSystemTaskParentBase")
     194             :   {}
     195             : 
     196             :   /*
     197             :    * Start the task. This must be called from the PBackground thread only.
     198             :    */
     199             :   void
     200             :   Start();
     201             : 
     202             :   /*
     203             :    * The error codes are defined in xpcom/base/ErrorList.h and their
     204             :    * corresponding error name and message are defined in dom/base/domerr.msg.
     205             :    */
     206             :   void
     207             :   SetError(const nsresult& aErrorCode);
     208             : 
     209             :   /*
     210             :    * The function to perform task operation. It will be run on the I/O
     211             :    * thread of the parent process.
     212             :    * Overrides this function to define the task operation for individual task.
     213             :    */
     214             :   virtual nsresult
     215             :   IOWork() = 0;
     216             : 
     217             :   /*
     218             :    * Wrap the task success result to FileSystemResponseValue for sending it
     219             :    * through IPC. This method runs in the PBackground thread.
     220             :    * It will be called when the task is completed successfully and we need to
     221             :    * send the task success result back to the child process.
     222             :    */
     223             :   virtual FileSystemResponseValue
     224             :   GetSuccessRequestResult(ErrorResult& aRv) const = 0;
     225             : 
     226             :   /*
     227             :    * After finishing the task operation, handle the task result.
     228             :    * If it is an IPC task, send back the IPC result. It runs on the PBackground
     229             :    * thread.
     230             :    */
     231             :   void
     232             :   HandleResult();
     233             : 
     234             :   bool
     235           0 :   HasError() const { return NS_FAILED(mErrorValue); }
     236             : 
     237             :   NS_IMETHOD
     238             :   Run() override;
     239             : 
     240             :   virtual nsresult
     241             :   GetTargetPath(nsAString& aPath) const = 0;
     242             : 
     243             : private:
     244             :   /*
     245             :    * Wrap the task result to FileSystemResponseValue for sending it through IPC.
     246             :    * It will be called when the task is completed and we need to
     247             :    * send the task result back to the content. This runs on the PBackground
     248             :    * thread.
     249             :    */
     250             :   FileSystemResponseValue
     251             :   GetRequestResult() const;
     252             : 
     253             : protected:
     254             :   /*
     255             :    * To create a parent process task delivered from the child process through
     256             :    * IPC.
     257             :    */
     258             :   FileSystemTaskParentBase(FileSystemBase* aFileSystem,
     259             :                            const FileSystemParams& aParam,
     260             :                            FileSystemRequestParent* aParent);
     261             : 
     262             :   virtual
     263             :   ~FileSystemTaskParentBase();
     264             :

     266             :   RefPtr<FileSystemBase> mFileSystem;
     267             :   RefPtr<FileSystemRequestParent> mRequestParent;
     268             :   nsCOMPtr<nsIEventTarget> mBackgroundEventTarget;
     269             : };
